reviews.review_msg: Thomas is really good at explaining difficult concepts. This course is really tough, so naturally he gets some pushback about tough exams. However, if you show up to lectures and pay attention you will be ok. Pay attention when he covers extra problems - they will definitely come up later. Definitely the GOAT for economics profs at SFU.
Amazing is all I can say. This prof TRULY cares and responds to your questions very quickly! Honestly was way more accessible than his TA's.

I have never met someone more worthy of tenure and a 10 figure salary! He is the best econ prof I have had. A god among mortals. A certain demographic struggled with using English at an English-speaking university, but you should be fine if you didn't use a cheating company to pass TOEFL.

Absolute amazing professor that will answer your questions instantly! He truly cares for his students and I really loved taking his class. As long as you watch the lectures, attend tutorial and do practice problems you will be fine!
Take him and he'll carry you
